function_description: Create a new board within an existing project.
initial_state: User is logged into the 4ga Boards web app, has navigated to the specific project page where they want to create the board, and the project should not have any boards created yet.
steps: Locate and click the 'Create Board' button within the project page.
Enter the board name in the provided field.
Confirm the creation by clicking the 'Save' or 'Create' button.
expected_state: A new board is created within the selected project, ready to have lists and cards organized.
